definition: someone employed to ride horses in horse races, to ride a racehorse as a professional jockey
details:
noun
- someone employed to ride horses in horse races
= example: someone employed to ride horses in horse races
- an operator of some vehicle or machine or apparatus
= example: an operator of some vehicle or machine or apparatus
verb
- to ride a racehorse as a professional jockey
= example: to ride a racehorse as a professional jockey
- to defeat someone through trickery or deceit
= example: to defeat someone through trickery or deceit
= synonyms: cheat
- to compete for an advantage or a position
= example: to compete for an advantage or a position
